summary: Backend API testing completed for Compliance Vault Pro admin endpoints. All 22 API tests passed successfully. Phase 2 validation shows 33/34 tests passing (1 failure due to no provisioned test clients in database - expected).

minor.issue: No provisioned clients in database for idempotency testing - this is a test data issue, not a code bug

critical_code_review_comments: APScheduler integration in server.py is correctly implemented with daily (9:00 AM UTC) and monthly (1st of month, 10:00 AM UTC) jobs
Admin login correctly bypasses client association check for ROLE_ADMIN users
Job status endpoint correctly returns scheduler info including next_run times
Manual job trigger endpoint properly validates job_type parameter
seed_data_creation: Test created TEST_invite_* and TEST_dup_* clients during invite endpoint testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin endpoints tested and working. Email sending via Postmark is MOCKED (logs only). No provisioned test clients exist in database - Phase 2 idempotency test will fail until a client completes full provisioning flow. APScheduler is running with 2 scheduled jobs (daily_reminders, monthly_digest).

mocked_apis.Postmark email service: MOCKED - emails are logged but not actually sent
